name: ReasonerAgent
description: ReasonerAgent is an AI-powered assistant designed to process user tasks by leveraging contextual memory data to generate accurate and concise responses. It reads configuration files, initializes the Memory client (mem0), and utilizes a language model to provide high-quality answers based on user queries and associated memory context.

inputs.name: task
inputs.description: The user-provided task or query that the agent uses to generate a response.

outputs.name: reasoner_result
outputs.description: The response generated by the ReasonerAgent based on the input task and memory context.
